thread.title: Maryland fires football coach Randy Edsall
thread.title_full: Maryland fires football coach Randy Edsall

author: DAVID GINSBURG
title: Maryland fires football coach Randy Edsall
text:
Jay LaPrete Maryland fires football coach Randy Edsall 
Maryland head coach Randy Edsall instructs his team against Ohio State during the second quarter of an NCAA college football game Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. Ohio State beat Maryland 49-28. (AP Photo/Jay LaPrete) Jay LaPrete Maryland fires football coach Randy Edsall 
Maryland head coach Randy Edsall instructs his team against Ohio State during the second quarter of an NCAA college football game, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. Ohio State beat Maryland 49-28. (AP Photo/Jay LaPrete) Posted: Sunday, October 11, 2015 11:08 am | Updated: 12:01 pm, Sun Oct 11, 2015. Maryland fires football coach Randy Edsall Associated Press | 
COLLEGE PARK, Md. (AP) — Randy Edsall was fired as Maryland's football coach Sunday, less than 24 hours after the team's third straight lopsided defeat. 
The dismissal comes in the middle of Edsall's fifth season with the Terrapins. He is 22-34 since taking over in 2011.
